content: Set up a personalized assistant for your team by adding a knowledge base, selecting the ideal model, and connecting an MCP server. Invite your colleagues to collaborate and make the most of the agentâ€™s chat capabilities.

comment.text: This text describes how to set up and use AI agents for a team. It appears within the UI when a user views an empty AI Agents folder, explaining how to configure and collaborate using these agents. Translators should focus on conveying the process of creating and utilizing personalized AI assistants.
